Posts.EditableText: I uploaded my new picture and poetry generation application, this morning. It is a really nice randomizer in a gift box. It does not play on the phone, not my phone, at least. And I may want to tweak it, later on, at some point, however, it has already written me some astonishing poems.
Posts.HTML: I uploaded my new picture and poetry generation application, this morning. It is a really nice randomizer in a gift box. It does not play on the phone, not my phone, at least. And I may want to tweak it, later on, at some point, however, it has already written me some astonishing poems.

Posts.EditableText:
I decided it made sense as something to use with a phone, so I created a 1/2 version that works on the phone. So, it does, now. It works on your phone.
https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/v7rqrjrct0azl4ng99vi_g/this-autowritten-poem-journal-phone-friendly
